attributes.action: If 2nd referendum re UK's part of the EU is remain we call for a 3rd referendum
attributes.additional_details: There is currently a petition for a 2nd referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union, to have such a referendum would be undemocratic so we call, in the event of a majority vote for "remain" in a 2nd referendum, for a 3rd referendum.
attributes.background: There is currently a petition for a 2nd referendum on Britain's membership of the European Union, to have such a referendum would be undemocratic so we call, in the event of a majority vote for "remain" in a 2nd referendum, for a 3rd referendum.
